HomeWiki:
Project Description

as learning purpose, customized web ui themes based nop commerce 3.5 version.

provider mobile theme from for nop commerce 3.5, separated NOP commerce into 2 version.

add new project "NOP.CDN" for performance purpose split app into two child website.

 

  • using .net 4.5, ASP.net MVC, EntityFramework 
  • N-Tier Architecture
  • Security using Forms Authentication
  • pagination using "more results" button
  • bootstrap css
  • Unobtrusive Client Side Validation using jQuery.Validate
  • Nice validation messages using just CSS
  • tinyMCE as wysiwyg editor

official verison is http://nopcommerce.codeplex.com/

address is ASP.net MVC Tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fsfOFL4bXXA
